_meta.description: DigiList typography tokens based on Designsystemet.no
_meta.font_stack: System font stack (as defined in Designsystemet)
_meta.note: No custom webfonts. Uses Designsystemet.no typography without modifications.

rules.min_text_size: No text smaller than Small for interactive elements
rules.no_tightening: Do not 'tighten' text to fit more content
